text:
Hi there,

I am redesigning our company blog and for the header I created a global module but I see that the styling on the listing page does corrupt somehow, even though it is ok on the single blog page.

Does anyone know there is an additional builtin style applied to blog homepage/listing?

Hi, I'm having an issue with an image slider module using Slick Slider on a client site. Starting at 767 px, the slider becomes overset. Any suggestions for how to fix this? <https://www.jmchomeremodeling.com/choose-jmc-nj-home-remodeling/>
Is it possible to group modules without it being in a theme? Maybe something in the `meta.json`? So when they select modules on the page builder it will be grouped.
create a “theme” in the folder the modules  is in
